thread.title: Adorable photo of daddy-daughter tea party with Florida deputy...
thread.title_full: Adorable photo of daddy-daughter tea party with Florida deputy... | www.statesman.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Adorable photo of daddy-daughter tea party with Florida deputy...
text:
The image of a Florida sheriff’s deputy having a tea party with his young daughter before work went viral this week.
Collier County Sheriff’s Office Cp.l Adam Dillman is seen recently in full uniform seated at a tiny table across from his daughter, who is wearing a princess dress and tiara. The photo was posted to Facebook to serve as a reminder “that deputies are human beings.”
>> Read more trending stories
“They are fathers, mothers, brothers, sisters,” the Sheriff’s Office wrote in the Facebook post . “They have families at home that are praying for their safety every day.”
CCSO deputy Adam Dillman enjoying a few precious moments with his daughter before work. This photo is a great reminder...
Posted by Collier County Sheriff's Office on Thursday, September 24, 2015
